articles.title: Maryland opens online preregistration portal for COVID mass vaccination sites. Here’s how to sign up. - Baltimore Sun
articles.description: Maryland residents eligible for the COVID-19 vaccine can now preregister for an immunization appointment at one of the state’s five regional mass vaccination sites by putting their information into one online portal.
